website_summaries.verdict: Tough speakers that will stand up to rough weather. Excellent audio quality over a large area.
pros: Speakers will swivel to change the aim of the sound
Exceeds industrial and military specifications for environmental endurance
Easy installation and mounting with a minimal number of parts
Better than average audio and waterproof performance at this price point
cons: Slight distortion of sound at low frequencies

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE POLK.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE POLK.....and these also sound great. Easy install. I had first gotten the Atrium 5, and returned it. The Atrium 6 has much better bass (big sound difference).....and also note: while it does not say in the amazon description, it says on the owners manual - the Atrium 6 (and larger Atrium) - have a back port for 3db greater bass response. And it does. The Atrium 5 did not.....So, if you like deeper sound - purchase the Atrium 6. Great for late night jazz. ....also, i got a good deal off the open box WAREHOUSE DEALS with amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Martinkus

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poorly designed connection.
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer mentioned, don't plan on using banana plugs with these. Pictured is a dual banana plug (a canonical Genrad 274-MB, which defined the genre). They need to make the recess larger, or angle the binding posts more. Not really an issue if permanently mounted, just use spade lugs, or even clamp the wire. But if you want to move them around, that's much more difficult than simply using a dual banana plug. Dinged one star for poor design.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of greaty quality sound for the pool area!
customer_reviews.text: Large outdoor area coverage is great! I bought outdoor 14 gauage buriable wire, 4x4 deck posts and bored through them each way for a seamless look. Then i buried the posts and cemented them. I have 4 of these atrium 6 speakers with an underpowered receiver and they still sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Great Sounding Speakers that hold up in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: Great, clean, clear, tight sound. Using these 10 hours per day outside at the pool in South Florida. Get rained on, wind, sun, and they are holding up fine. Capable of putting out more crystal clear sound than necessary. Have to turn them down sometimes. Running an Onkyo A-9010 Amplifier to these. The amp puts out clean sound & power without effects (like hall, stadium, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: TJ Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Blown from the manufacturer?
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was terrible. Read all the reviews before I bought them. Hooked them up to a brand new Pyle 200 watt receiver and the woofers were farting and buzzing at 1/3 volume. Hooked them up to my lg shelf system and they sounded just as bad. Hooked the lg speakers up to the Pyle receiver just to rule out the power supply and they sounded great. If the reviews of the atrium 6 are true, then the pair I received must be damaged or defective from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sounding Speakers with a Large Sound Field
customer_reviews.text: The most impressive feature of these speakers is the large sound field. I have these speakers mounted on the posts of a screened-in, 12 foot gazebo, facing my house, and even behind these speakers, out in my yard, they sound great! I don't know how, but they fill the yard with music - and my yard is rather large - over an acre. They have a very clear sound and decent bass. I am very particular about speakers and these speakers exceed my expectations. Although they are not very large, they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Ferd Reetz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are truly amazing! I've been looking for something loud for my pool deck and started with the bose 500 which was garbage then some lantern-looking Bluetooth outdoor speakers which didn't get loud enough but then settled on these and....WOW. Highly recommend pairing with Fosi 5.0 Bluetooth receiver because the bass, treble and volume knobs really bring out the performance.... really can't even go more than 60% without worrying about the cops showing up! Lol. Love the easy mounting brackets and just used some wood screws I had laying around to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Replacing my Bose with these!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a great Amazon Warehouse deal on these! Hooked these up as a second pair of speakers attached to my receiver. I have a 1500 square foot barn that is man town ready! These speakers were mounted on the outside while I already have Bose speakers on the inside...well after hearing these compared to my Bose....they blew the Bose away! So, I just ordered another set of these and I’m replacing the Bose! Much better sound and bass! These seem to handle the music much better! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbo

customer_reviews.title: Wow just wow
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say I’ve ever been a fan of Polk. But my oh my, these are just about the finest outdoor speakers available for the price I think! I have these powered on my covered patio by an ancient Sonos ZP100, and they are wonderful. Because of where I had to put the speakers, I am glad I had EQ and Balance settings. With a few tweaks they sound so rich and full, and they have only been playing for 2 hrs so far. I opted for the Atrium 6’s to get the lower bass and I had a bit more budget. I’m so glad I got these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Babul A. Mukherjee

customer_reviews.title: 4 years of use and still sound as good as day one
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for around 4yrs now. I use them maybe 12-15times a year. They still sound great really clear crisp sound with nice bass. I like them everytime get the opportunity to use them. They were a little pricey but glad i spent the extra money. They are mounted under a covered porch and dont get direct sunlight or rain but have regularly pressure washed patio and washed down directly with garden hose with no problems. Really happy with these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Frick

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: We use these with our Sonos system as a way to get music on our patio. They are larger than we had anticipated, but still fit in the space that we wanted to put them in. They are generally protected from the weather by our eaves, and so we haven't put them in any extreme conditions. But the main thing that I wanted to point out is that they do sound great outdoors. It can be hard to get good speakers for outside because of the amount of space the sound needs to fill, but I think these do a great job especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Completely surprised by Look and sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed speakers on my covered patio this morning; Install was very easy; the locking bracket system is very reliable. Once installed I turned on my Pioneer VSX810S stereo receiver as was AMAZED by the quality, rich, crisp sound these speakers delivered. I was completely shocked by the bass response; Installed they are also amazing to look at. These replaced the pair of Bose 151 (not the SE) I had installed in the patio; They were okay but It was hard not to notice the lack of uniform, full rich sound. Thank you Polk for the Atrium 6. BEST Speaker I have heard for a patio in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these great sounding weather proof speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. I installed them on my patio, which has absolutely no shelter. These speakers have been exposed to snow, heat and everything in between, and they have held up like a champ! Sometimes I wish they had just a little more base, but I really have no complaints. They were very easy to install, and they can be placed so that you get the best sound from them. If I ever need more outdoor speakers, these will be at the top of my list. I have them attached to a Sonos connect amp, which turned them into wifi speakers. Just love them!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor speakers with immersive sound. Sound clarity and volume is superb in my 1 acre back yard. Mounting brackets are easy to install and give many secure mounting positions so that you can direct the sound in almost any direction, making it easy to fill a large area with sound. Overall they're exactly what you would expect from a speaker in this price range and blow the cheaper ones out of the water in terms of mounting, durability, and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Christen

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on the positive reviews here. I installed these to beams above my back patio wired to a Sonos Connect / Dayton Audio APA 150 Amp. Installation was straight-forward. I can tell you, these speakers sound GREAT! Highs, mids and lows all come through clearly at all volume levels. I'm overly-impressed and can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Chose the Polk 6 over other Polk options due to the size of my backyard and the distance between the speakers. They sound great. These are the 3rd set of exterior speakers I've installed in 20 years (Bose & JBL's previously). I chose them due to their rating. So far I am very pleased with their sound clarity and ability to handle the bass.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Give therm a few hours to break in...
customer_reviews.text: These replaced some 20 year old Boston Acoustics that had served us well but had gotten a little spongy sounding. We played some Price on the old speakers first and then hooked up the new and played the same music at the same volume. It was better but not great. I know there is debate about speaker break in but I just left these on for a about 5 hours and when I cam back out...they sounded great! Huge improvement over the old speakers. Definitely a lot of bang for the buck. We'll see how they sound in 20 years...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Theel

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an upgrade to my Yamaha speakers. I mounted them in an inside corner under an eve and the sound quality is great. There is not an abundance of bass, rather a nice well rounded sound. I have an onkyo 100 watt reciever and even at full volume the speaks sound great with no distortion noticable. At lower levels the sound is similar. Installing an mounting was a breeze with the seperate bracket and large screw system that's hand tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality from a speaker this size
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these outdoors at a house on a lake. We wanted music down by the water without having to carry portable speakers back and forth. These are mounted up by the house but deliver excellent sound even 50ft away. The bass is better than I'd expect and the overall soundstage is good for just a pair of speakers this size. My neighbors even commented on how well it sounded... which let me know I should probably turn down the volume :)
customer_reviews.author: GeekDad

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Bose
customer_reviews.text: Not one to do many reviews but just had on thesis speakers. Relate my old Bose speakers on my 48' boat. Man what a sound. Bang for the buck!!! If your looking at them just buy em you will be impressed!! Rob Well it’s nine months later and the speakers are starting to make all kinds of sounds, static pops, this is on my boat and it does get played loud but they shouldn’t be doing this, I think for outside around your house or something may be good but not for what I’m using it for. Although I would probably by Polk again just bigger
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced sound and well designed all around.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, especially for outdoor speakers. I had a pair of Atrium 6 speakers for many years installed in my garage / workshop, just bought another pair for the patio. The sound is pretty well balanced with a good amount of bass that is pretty punchy and satisfying but not low enough to annoy your neighbors. I’ve tried the Polk Atrium 8, but went back to the 6s. To me, they just sound better, maybe they pair better with my amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: MyPrime

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from a decent sized speaker
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound fantastic! They aren't the smallest and people will definitely see them, but its worth the trade off in the sound quality. We use these on our boat dock and so far have held up well over the last several months. We have a couple of the smaller pairs on our boats and they have held help well there for the last couple of years. I expect these to last a long time and continue to impress our guests.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Superb outdoor speakers, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these on Amazon for just under $200 a few months back, and I just recently had the opportunity to install them. I mounted them high on our back porch, close to the porch ceiling, and I'm streaming music from Spotify through an old Denon receiver. They sound absolutely fantastic, bringing music alive and not needing any additional bass (or anything else). Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NightWriter

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these speakers. I haven't found any negatives yet. I have them mounted under the soffit so the water proof thing doesn't really come in to play. I was unsure when I ordered because I don't have any experience with outdoor speakers but trusted the reviews. So glad I did. These speakers sound fantastic on my patio wired into zone 2 of my Yamaha RX-V683 receiver in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Superb in every way
customer_reviews.text: Hello, a real, unbiased person here. I don't usually write reviews, but felt obligated to after getting these and hooking them up. We live in the country and have 3 acres with some neighbors a few hundred feet away. We wanted something to pack a punch, but not be obnoxious. These speakers have spectacular clarity from at least 60-75 feet away at a good volume. No distortion whatsoever at high volumes. I was considering buying a subwoofer to go with these prior to hooking them up. Nope, not needed. Worth every penny. If you are on the fence about these or anything else, get these, ya dingus.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jansen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound for outdoor summer music
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to play the sound for our Corona Virus Drive-in Theater in our driveway. I wanted everyone to be able to hear, even while in their cars. These speakers are fantastic. They're bigger then I expected (wine glass for scale), and they mount with two screws (easy on/off if you don't want to leave them outside every night). I've cranked the receiver up beyond what my neighbors will tolerate and I have yet to hear any popping or static. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and get these
customer_reviews.text: What amazing speakers, the depth of sound is fantastic for speakers of this size. It's pretty rare you see so many 5 star reviews an any product sold on Amazon. It's because they are so good. You can't do better for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: BigJerm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!! Very easy mounting system. Sound quality is unbelievable. They're in my garage hooked up to a cheap old home theater receiver and from outside the garage at the end of the driveway, it sounds like I have a professional sound system in there! They sound great without turning the sub on, but with the Polk PSW10 10 inch sub, it's a great matchup.
customer_reviews.author: Tavis

customer_reviews.title: Love for our get-togethers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought two of these for our outdoor kitchen area which is covered but the rain can still blow in on them a bit. We’ve used them many times and the quality is really great for the price; however, my husband wants to add a subwoofer to them! Personal preference! He hooked them up and I didn’t hear any complaints from him with the ease or process. They are adjustable so we can turn the speakers toward the yard or in toward the sitting area. I love them! Let’s see how long they last!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C. Appel

customer_reviews.title: Polk does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Best deck speakers I have purchased and owned. Reasonably priced. Replace antiquated outside speakers that were crushed by a spring hail storm. Pure sound with great base response. Love the look and strongly recommend for outside speakers as they handle the brutal Colorado foothills sun exposure. Easy to mount and connect.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerDan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must buy!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually you get what you pay for. Let me tell you in this case it is definitely not true. I got more than I could have imagined I bought 2 pair for my gazebo outside. I powered them with a Yamaha reciver open box from best buy paid $115 for it since it's going to be outside. So I wasn't expecting too much, was I wrong they sound amazing, clear, and loud!!!. I could only imagine how they sound with a high end receiver. This is a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: richard rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great Investment.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! These speakers are amazing. I put them out on our deck and they are absolutely dynamite. Best investment I have made in years. Better than I thought they would ever be. My buddy has Klipsch outdoor speakers and they aren't any better than these. Sharp clear sound with perfect bass. Really impressed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Atrium 6 speakers have been mounted up towards the roof my covered dock for about two months. Due to the possibility of dirt bags stealing them, I didn't want to spend much more than a couple hundred dollars. Well worth the $250/pair. Sound great. Way easy to install and change direction of speakers. If said dirt bags get them, I would not hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews don't lie. Great speakers for the money! I have them outside pointing toward our pergola, great sound range. I didn't know whether to mount them horizontally or vertically. I decided to mount them horizontally and I was not disappointed! I have it connected to an older Onkyo receiver with the capability to run two different rooms independently or together. Now we can listen to our jam inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: No regrets, these speakers are fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t compare these to other high end brands. I replaced a super cheap pair of speaker with these, but they sound amazing and I couldn’t be happier. I bought 2 pair and put one in each corner of my patio. The more I listen to them the more I like them. And they seem to sound better and better the more they play.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Jones

customer_reviews.title: my concerns were unfounded as these speakers sound amazing! All in all
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews and based my decision to purchase a pair of these based on all the positive comments... I couldn't agree more with all the five-star reviews! These speakers have tremendous depth of sound with clear highs and strong lows. I was originally concerned about how well they'd fill my screen porch (25x20 feet) with sound, powered with a Sonos Connect Amp. However after getting them wired up and powered, my concerns were unfounded as these speakers sound amazing! All in all, I'm completely happy with my purchase! I'll report back with how they handle the Minnesota weather.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Going to send them back  guess I can't so into the trash can
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good for a couple weeks now they're both distorted after 2 months . Got ahold of the warranty center. You have to take them apart and trouble shoot the woofer and tweeters So much for the 5 year warrenty. I figured they would send a replacement pair and take these back. I guess you get what you pay for! These are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Dusharm

customer_reviews.title: These are a perfect replacement for my Elan outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect replacement for my Elan outdoor speakers. After 10 years of outdoor abuse they needed replacing and these fit the bill. They produce a nice level of bass and produce good audio over a a fairly large volume of outdoor space. At about 50 Watts they are uncomfortably loud yet still very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan N

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly amazing performance
customer_reviews.text: Driving these with a Sonos Amp on my back deck. I expected phenomenal sound but I'm blown away with the bass and overall volume these things are capable of. I'll have the cops showing up long before I get to the max volume these can handle. Incredibly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PghHLT

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio Atrium Speakers Can’t be Beat!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible!!! What value for the money. Such well constructed and boy do they put out the sound. I put my receiver at about 1/2 way and my neighbor that was roughly about an acre away turned on his lights and came outside. I would hate to see what they would do if I put it at 3/4. Be sure to spend the extra dollars and buy high grade 14 gauge outdoor speaker wire to go with it that comes in coax like cable. This way you will be covered for the winter. My music never sounded so good both inside and now outside.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Chirico II

customer_reviews.title: High end outdoor speakers that deliver.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, these are great sounding speakers. Was dubious about box speakers that could deliver. The money was well worth it. Bass, mid and high are a matched blend. I know you are limited on outdoor speakers that can deliver but these do. Pay a little more and get the sound you deserve. Well done Polk.
customer_reviews.author: ACH07

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of bass, and these speakers deliver. I wasn't even able to install them near a corner, but they still have a very full and loud sound. I don't plan on having a subwoofer, but for two outdoor speakers, you will get a very deep sound. Assuming they hold up in the elements, I'm very happy with my purchase. I plan on bringing them in for storage during the winter. Also, keep an eye on the price as it tends to fluctuate quite a bit, and sometimes the black color is much cheaper than the white, and vise versa.
customer_reviews.author: MattMN

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great-Pool party time!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! It hasn’t rained yet so not sure about waterproof but it says they are. Sound is great for what we need - Pool parties! Super easy to install. Does not come with speaker wire. Neighbors are going to listen to good music whether they like it or not with these speakers! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are strong speakers for the price. They have been installed outdoors for the summer. It has rained a lot and there are no issues thus far. They are decently loud and have ok bass. Could probably use the addition of an outdoor sub but definitely work well without it.
customer_reviews.author: Davebee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sound with specifically good base response for the size
customer_reviews.text: My speakers are placed on a 24 ft high brick wall with no baffle to reflect base. My patio is only 20ft x 20ft = 400sf They still sound surprisingly punchy with good base. If you're looking for very high fidelity, maybe you upsize, but I'd certainly buy them again. The value/price ratio makes these an easy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DB Dannyboy

customer_reviews.title: Crisp highs, carries bass very well.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced Bose 151's and am very pleased. These Atrium6 speakers are crisper and have excellent bass for outdoor speakers. I have only one complaint. I was going to purchase another pair but the price went up from $250 to $399.... I wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair. I usually don't blast these, but they are capable. If you buy quality products and listen to well produced music, you don't need to blast the sound to enjoy. Although, sometimes it happens, and it's nice to know I have the speakers to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Siudy

customer_reviews.title: Quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 20 year old outdoor speaker that lasted much longer than I ever expected. They were the AR acususic research. They were a nice sounding quality speaker. I installed these and will say the sound is awesome. The music fills the entire back yard. Good bass and crisp sound. I do recommend purchasing these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near worth the money, for the sound you get!
customer_reviews.text: Hate saying anything bad, but for the money the sound sucks on these!! We bought them and then returned them the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Linda k Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the sound from these speakers. Got them for the patio around the pool, and had planned to add a sub-woofer. However, the bass is pretty good out of these guys, so I'm holding off on the sub-woofer. Update after almost a year: I've moved these speakers around a bit, and now have them suspended from a shed like overhang. They are amazingly bright and clear. I can put something like an acoustic guitar solo on, and everyone is completely blown away by the sound. I've got just a bit of bass boost into them (due to their mounting position, suspended in mid-air), and the sound is even and balanced. Wish I could give them 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Polk Won't Honor Warranty
customer_reviews.text: We had these speakers mounted on our garage for 3 months. They were hooked up to a Sonos Amp and working great. This weekend one speaker blew. I attempted to file a warranty claim and was told since we did not buy them from an authorized dealer the warranty was void. The problem is I thought we were purchasing them from Amazon, not an unauthorized Polk dealer, they were delivered sealed in the original packaging. Extremely disappointing customer service and frustrated that the speaker blew after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of speakers, we have them paired with a Sonos amp, the acoustic clarity is perfect. The low end bass is a little weak but that could be because they are outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: As a company we also look for the best equipment at the best price. Polk Audio is our go-to brand for all speaker installs. These things absolutely rock! Don't hesitate, these will be all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a set of older Atrium 4 speakers with these. They sound great in the back yard as main speakers and the older Atrium 4's as the back speakers on both sides of the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cal tech

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Sound
customer_reviews.text: Just buy them. I usually buy Bose but decided to try the Polk Audio. They are amazing. The sound is very clear. The bass is great!! I have them hooked up to a Kenwood 100 watt amp that’s 33 years old and the sound quality is beyond my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Poke audio atrium 6 speakers
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the poke audio 4 atrium speakers about five months ago! And now I upgraded to the atrium 6. What a difference!! These are awesome, plus great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great out door speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic - amazingly rich sound with Bass for outdoor speakers. I use them with a sonos amp and the sound on my back deck and down to my pool is clear and full. The highs are not Tinny and the lows are rounded out and nice. They have also survived the heat and the ridiculous rain storms of Texas.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Great value in Sound Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of an audiophile and enjoy high quality sound in music. These speakers are terrific! I mounted them up high in my outside covered back porch and they are a “10”! Superb sound quality , great open , full stereo sound , and super bass frequencies! I would buy these speakers again in a second. Plus , the mounting system is cool and the look great. Very good value for the price..... 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I wish frequency response covered the full audible spectrum (20-20khz) but other than that these are great outdoor speakers. I have them running from a decent head unit I use for music by my pool, and the speakers are mounted about 100' apart under the eaves of my house. Sounds good. The lack slightly on the low frequencies, but only slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good while they work
customer_reviews.text: They worked very well first summer, but after just one winter, one is making a weird sound and the other one sounds boomy, no treble.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Sanz

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friends pool deck. The existing speakers failed in a storm. These looked and sounded great and the install took around 45 min (for both, including testing) I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: shannon tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Buy these speakers
customer_reviews.text: The Polk Atrium 6 is more than enough for our outdoor deck needs! Great sounding speakers, we power with a 7 channel Yamaha amp, the sound quality is great and the mounting couldn’t be simpler. Stop looking and buy these.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Love these, but they are large.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Sold as used like new. Plastic had only been removed from one speaker. Really were new. Have not stress tested yet, easy to install and sound great. They are BIG, but they have bass we never had before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Dosier

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speakers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for outside in the garage and they sound great! Adequate bass but for more umph a sub would be advised. I have a sub attached when I want/need more boom. Love the fact you can directionally adjust these simply and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, perfect sound!! When the neighbors were all away, we cranked it up and these little speakers handled it all, tried all different music genres, and laa had great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Struniak

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: love them! not sure about my neighbors though, lol on weekends they play 24/7 sound great!
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: Huge sound, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Two of them fill a huge outdoor pool area and backyard with music. For what they cost they sound excellent. Great bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got them
customer_reviews.text: The sound is so impressive. I read the reviews and thought too good to be true they are the RE deal.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Use on deck that is covered
customer_reviews.text: I have these speakers outside on my covered deck (roof). Sound quality is exceptional. Rich highs and reasonable bass response. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: quality and good sound
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are very well made , mounting brokers are very easy to mount speakers and remove speakers from mounts , really good sound for the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: JJBDGB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Polk. My standard go to brand for speakers. These did not disappoint. Good quality and robust construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers Polk Audio Atrium 6
customer_reviews.text: I have a large back yard with a pool, kitchen a large patio and a pergola and I wanted speakers (4) that would sound great in my entire back yard. These speakers do the trick. Bass is good and treble is good. I have attached them to my SONOS amp and driven by a Pioneer 200 Watt receiver. It is too early to comment on the weather proof aspect. CON: One of the speakers came damaged and is not working. Something is rattling in it.
customer_reviews.author: Swissguard

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, shameful delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great! The delivery was shameful!!!! It’s was Raining, the box was wet! Throw a garbage bag around the item next time. The driver had to know it was RAINING!!
customer_reviews.author: donna b

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our outdoor patio/pool area. Super sound quality at high volume
customer_reviews.author: Chelli B

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, look great and excellent mounting brackets. Replaced 5 year old cheap outdoor speakers, thought I might need to add sub under my deck but after listening to these they sound perfect by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Muzzicato

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the porch
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a set that had worn out for our back porch. My husband was able to use the same screw holes and the install was so quick! They sound great and look really nice. We chose white because our old ones were white. So happy to have the music back!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smolen

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding solid speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers and I am a picky musician of many years. I have had a great experience with Polk customer service in the past as well
customer_reviews.author: Anthem

customer_reviews.title: You are better off spending the extra money over the Pyle brand ...
customer_reviews.text: These Polk are incredibly simple to install compared to other outdoor speakers. You are better off spending the extra money over the Pyle brand that's on here for $60. I used to buy them exclusively but they kept breaking due to poor design. These are worth the extra money. I buy a lot of audio video equipment and you can't go wrong with Polk
customer_reviews.author: Josh Holland

customer_reviews.title: the sound
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with how Great they sound. I thought I would lose a lot of the sound and bottom, but these are great for outside speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound....  full and clear
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound, easy to install. I wanted more full and bass and you get tilt with these speakers. You will not ge disappointed, I will be buying a second pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers Right  Size
customer_reviews.text: I used these indoors as speakers for a multi room system. I wanted a smallish speaker with good bass and clear sound. These are just that. They definitely have distinguishable bass which seems to be a complaint with most small speakers. The mounting system works well to keep them close to the wall. Their design works well in corners.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality, mounting bracket are really nice. Much thicker material that other speaker systems.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal L.

customer_reviews.title: Polk Atrium 6 speakers - Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Mounted in lanai (no direct sun, no rain, not protected from heat or humidity) for last year plus in SW Florida with high heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers. Sound is unbelievable. We use them outside by the pool and the sound fills the area. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, I can't hear you over my dope speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Man, these things rock. Sounds great, I can't put them all the way up because my neighbors would definitely complain. Amazing Quality and Sound, transformed my Patio to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, solid bass
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a pair of Boston Acoustics speakers that had lasted nearly 25 years before deteriorating. Good, solid sound and good bass response. These are under cover on a screened porch in humid Northern Virginia. Hope I get 25 years out of them!
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the clarity
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the fidelity these put out. They sound great!
customer_reviews.author: 2BikersAndABorderCollie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy switch-out with old speakers. Sound is much better than my old Advent 3 way speakers. Very pleased with sound quality for rear patio.
customer_reviews.author: john porras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these speakers as a replacement for a set we have had for 9 and a half tears. Our original ones were Atrium 5. The sound quality is excellent and very very clear. These are on our back porch and can be heard very clearly deep into the back yard even without the volume turned up a lot. The price, delivery speed and packaging was all excellent. We will enjoy these for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Nn

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: i'm using this speakers indoors for dolby atmos ceiling speakers and there are great! if anyone is interested in doing the same thing don't be shy in doing so just go for it!
customer_reviews.author: chip

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Good product the sound is great. Also have a set of Atrium 5 speakers as front speakers. Use the Atrium 6 speakers as rear speakers for Epson 3700 projector. Fills the hole patio with good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SPEAKERS!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome! They pump out some serious bass at any level. I have my TV wired into a small amplifier so I can watch TV and hear the TV through the speakers. These are a great buy for your backyard. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, sound great, have them out by the pool - pissing off the neighbors already!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Very happy I chose this and after only seeing all the reviews! Rich deep sound with excellent output. Great for parties. Has the sound of an indoor theater system with no echo or other sound distortions you can hear with outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these speakers. I consider myself an audiophile and these really sound good on my deck. Setup is a breeze, love the mounts.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: These Speakers Live Up to the Positive Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these speakers based off of the reviews. I am glad I made the purchase. they were delivered on time, easy to install and sound great. they are a great affordable option and i would recommend. My speakers are mounted under a covered roof area so I cannot speak on how they would perform in open weather but they work great in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Dale J.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! Unmatched
customer_reviews.text: I have 9 of the Atrium speakers and all I have to say is, WOW!!!! From start to finish I am happy. Thank You POLK for making a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patriotic purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing sound and easy installation! I highly recommend these speakers. We installed these on our deck and can still hear them loud and clear down by our pool. Pure quality for the music enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Varlaro

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I read reviews and spent the extra for the 6 series. IMO this is about as good as it gets for patio speakers. Rich full sound, good bass, nice highs. Can't wait for the next cookout!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Damelio

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed and happy with these outdoor speakers. Mounting and installation was easy. Speakers look and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Kosojet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great at my pool, they sound excellent and were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beltran

product_meta.title: Polk Audio Atrium 6 Outdoor Speakers with Bass Reflex Enclosure (Pair, Black) - All-Weather Durability | Broad Sound Coverage | Speed-Lock Mounting System
product_meta.description: Color:Atrium 6 BlackA workhorse when it comes to filling large spaces with the kind of big, lifelike high quality sound for all your outdoor entertainment. Atrium 6 speakers are All-Weather Certified and Water-Resistant—built to withstand the worst elements—salt-fog, UV, extreme temps or heavy rains, you name it. Aluminum grilles and bracket, with stainless steel and brass hardware means no rust—ever. Polk’s patented Dynamic Balance technology with 5.25" Driver, 1" Tweeter and Power Port Bass Venting analyzes the speaker’s entire electro-acoustic and mechanical system for improved material selection and more efficient geometry. These speakers are easy to install and look great both outdoors and indoors.
feature_bullets: Install your Atrium 6 Speakers in any large or open space—by a pool, in the patio, the sunroom, halls or office areas. They will deliver EXCEPTIONALLY GREAT SOUND, OUTDOORS OR INDOORS, no matter where you set them up

Equipped with 5 1/4" Dynamic Balance driver 1" dome tweeter provides WIDER SOUND DISPERSION & SURPRISINGLY POWERFUL BASS. At 100W, frequency response is as low as 60KHz and PowerPort bass venting, CUTS THROUGH LOUD, JARRING BACKGROUND NOISES

These loudspeakers come with a steeply-angled baffle design that fills expansive spaces with full-range sound that is sure to impress! GREAT AESTHETICS COMBINED & BEAUTIFUL LIVELY SOUND makes these speakers a preferred choice among music lovers worldwide

Atrium's one-click SPEED-LOCK MOUNTING BRACKET offers EASY, ANTI-SLIP ONE-HANDED INSTALLATION - mount speakers vertically or horizontally, to deliver the best sound in a variety of situations. Simply mount the swiveling C-bracket, adjust the angle and fasten the speaker with a click

THE SPEAKER FOR ALL SEASONS – it’s rugged durability, high environmental endurance & superior quality has helped Polk Outdoor Speakers win the all-weather Certification. They EFFORTLESSLY WITHSTAND EXTREME TEMPERATURES AND HEAVY RAIN year after year
